item.title: NodeJS + Cron: A series of attempts in getting rid of dangling processes
item.description: Short-lived scripts that sucked your resources for 1mins or at most 5mins - is probably fine. However, if it is recurring jobs in Cron and involves several tasks and at least an hour of processing - that’d be a different story. I was working on a simple NodeJS-based cron script with only 3 requirements: extract transform load Each one of these however would involve crunching through a million rows of data.
